00029 from Koo.Common import Common
00030 
00031 from Koo.Common.Calendar import *
00032 from Koo.Search.AbstractSearchWidget import *
00033 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00034 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00035 from PyQt4.uic import *
00036 
00037 (DateSearchWidgetUi, DateSearchWidgetBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('search_date.ui') )
00038 
00039 class DateSearchWidget(AbstractSearchWidget, DateSearchWidgetUi):
00040         def __init__(self, name, parent, attrs={}):
00041                 AbstractSearchWidget.__init__(self, name, parent, attrs)
00042                 DateSearchWidgetUi.__init__(self)
00043                 self.setupUi( self )
00044 
00045                 # Catch keyDownPressed
00046                 self.uiStart.installEventFilter( self )
00047                 self.uiEnd.installEventFilter( self )
00048 
00049                 self.widget = self
00050                 self.focusWidget = self.uiStart
00051                 self.connect( self.pushStart, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotStart )
00052                 self.connect( self.pushEnd, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotEnd )
00053 
00054         def slotStart(self):
00055                 PopupCalendarWidget( self.uiStart )
00056 
00057         def slotEnd(self):
00058                 PopupCalendarWidget( self.uiEnd )
00059 
00060         def value(self):
00061                 res = []
00062                 val = dateToStorage( textToDate( self.uiStart.text() ) )
00063                 if val:
00064                         res.append((self.name, '>=', val ))
00065                 else:
00066                         self.uiStart.clear()
00067                 val = dateToStorage( textToDate( self.uiEnd.text() ) )
00068                 if val:
00069                         res.append((self.name, '<=', val ))
00070                 else:
00071                         self.uiEnd.clear()
00072                 return res
00073 
00074         def clear(self):
00075                 self.uiStart.clear()
00076                 self.uiEnd.clear()
00077 
00078         def setValue(self, value):
00079                 if value:
00080                         self.uiStart.setText( unicode(value) )
00081                         self.uiEnd.setText( unicode(value) )
00082                 else:
00083                         self.uiStart.clear()
00084                         self.uiEnd.clear()
